1:
The blue frost warning signal for Mingxi County continues to be effective

The Mingxi County Meteorological Observatory continued to issue a blue frost warning signal at 17:00 on January 1, 2025: Affected by the cold air, the lowest temperature in our county is expected to reach 1-3℃ from tonight to tomorrow morning, with frost or freezing.

According to the Regulations on the Issuance and Dissemination of Meteorological Disaster Warning Signals and the Guide to the Defense of the Blue Frost Warning Signal, please pay attention to cold and keep warm; the government and agricultural and forestry authorities need to make preparations for frost prevention, remind farmers to pay attention to warning information; take necessary protective measures for crops, vegetables, flowers, fruits, and forestry breeding.
2:
Weining County Frost Blue Warning

Weining County Meteorological Observatory issued a frost blue warning signal at 6:19 on January 1, 2025: It is expected that in the next 24 hours, the lowest temperatures in Xueshan, Yungui, Shimen, Longjie, Xiushui, Haila, Caohai and other townships in our county will drop below 0℃, which may have an impact on agriculture. Please ask the government and agricultural and forestry authorities to make preparations for frost prevention in accordance with their duties; take certain protective measures for crops, vegetables, flowers, fruits, and forestry breeding; rural grassroots organizations and farmers should pay attention to local frost warning information and strengthen protection.
3:
Fangzheng County Meteorological Observatory issues yellow warning signal for road icing

Fangzheng County Meteorological Observatory issued yellow warning signal for road ice and snow at 18:00 on January 1, 2025: Affected by snowfall, roads in all towns and villages in our county may be icy or snowy in the next 24 hours, which will have a certain impact on traffic. The road surface is smooth and visibility is low.

Remind the general public:

* Transportation, public security and other departments should make preparations for road icing in accordance with their duties.
* Drivers should pay attention to road conditions and drive safely.
* Pedestrians should try to ride bicycles as little as possible when going out and pay attention to anti-skid.


Please relevant units and individuals pay attention to preventive work.
4:
Wuxi County Meteorological Observatory continues to issue a blue frost warning

Wuxi County Meteorological Observatory continues to issue a blue frost warning signal at 21:20 on January 1, 2025: It is expected that from 22:00 on January 1 to 11:00 on January 3, the minimum ground temperature in 25 towns with higher altitudes, including Hongchiba Town, Tianba Town, and Jianshan Town, will drop below 0℃, which will have an impact on agriculture. Please ask the government and agricultural and forestry authorities to make preparations for frost prevention in accordance with their duties; take certain protective measures for crops, vegetables, flowers, fruits, and forestry breeding; rural grassroots organizations and farmers should pay attention to local frost warning information so as to take measures to strengthen protection.
5:
Jiangge County Meteorological Observatory continues to issue a blue frost warning

Jiangge County Meteorological Observatory continues to issue a blue frost warning signal at 18:03 on January 1, 2025: It is expected that the minimum ground temperature in most towns and villages in our county will still drop below 0℃ in the next 48 hours, which will have an impact on agriculture.

Defense Guide:
1. The government and agricultural and forestry authorities should make preparations for frost prevention in accordance with their duties;
2. Certain protective measures should be taken for crops, vegetables, flowers, fruits, and forestry breeding;

Please pay attention to the safety of fire, electricity, and gas.
6:
Hengshan County Meteorological Observatory issues yellow haze warning

Hengshan County Meteorological Observatory issued a yellow haze warning signal at 6:10 on January 1, 2025: It is expected that moderate haze will appear in our county in the next 24 hours, which is likely to form moderate air pollution. Drivers are requested to drive carefully; the public needs to take appropriate protection because the air quality has been significantly reduced; patients with respiratory diseases should try to reduce going out and wear masks when going out.
8:
Shangzhou District Meteorological Observatory issued a blue warning signal for strong winds

Shangzhou District Meteorological Observatory issued a blue warning signal for strong winds at 14:32 on January 1, 2025: It is expected that in the next 24 hours, Yancun Town, Heishan Town, Yecun Town, Yangxie Town, Beikuanping Town, Dajing Town, Yaoshi Town, Liuwan Street, Chengguan Street, Dazhaoyu Street, Yangyuhe Town, Chenyuan Street, Shahezi Town, Jinlingsi Town, Sanchahe Town, Majie Town, Banqiao Town, and Muhuguan Town will be affected by strong winds. The average wind speed can reach above level 6, with gusts above level 7. Relevant departments and units are requested to do a good job in preventing strong winds in accordance with their duties; close doors and windows, reinforce fences, scaffolding, billboards and other structures that are easily blown by the wind; properly place outdoor items that are easily affected by strong winds, and cover construction materials. Active response measures should be taken for water operations and passing ships; pedestrians should ride bicycles as little as possible, and do not stay under billboards, temporary structures, etc. when it is windy. Relevant departments and units should pay attention to fire prevention in forests, grasslands, etc.

Mianzhu Meteorological Observatory continues to issue yellow warning signal for road icing

According to the warning, the road temperature is below 0℃, accompanied by precipitation, which is easy to form road icing, which has an adverse impact on traffic safety. 21:
Jinnan District Meteorological Observatory issues blue warning for high winds

The Jinnan District Meteorological Observatory issued a blue warning for high winds on land at 17:04 on December 24: It is expected that from tomorrow noon to night, all towns and streets in Jinnan District will experience northwest winds of level 4-5 and gusts of level 7-8. 

Please close doors and windows, reinforce structures that are easily blown by the wind, and properly place outdoor items that are easily affected by high winds. Try to ride bicycles as little as possible, and do not stay under billboards, temporary structures, etc. when it is windy. Active response measures should be taken for water operations and passing ships. Relevant units and personnel should pay attention to fire prevention in forests, grasslands, etc. All units are requested to take precautions and respond in accordance with the requirements of the Jinnan District Meteorological Disaster Emergency Plan.

Citizens are advised to continue wearing warm clothes and avoid staying outdoors for a long time. Relevant departments and units need to do a good job in related cold prevention work to ensure that citizens' production and life proceed normally. Citizens are requested to pay close attention to weather changes and take timely cold prevention measures.

The Ninghua County Meteorological Observatory issued a blue warning for cooling at 17:33 on December 27: Affected by strong cold air, the temperature in Ninghua County will drop significantly from the 28th, and the minimum temperature process will drop by 10-12℃, and locally exceed 12℃. The extreme minimum temperature occurred on the morning of the 29th, with most areas reaching -3-0℃, and Anyuan Town, Helong Township, and Zhiping Township reaching -5--3℃, with frost and ice.

Please pay attention to cold prevention and keep warm, especially the elderly, children and weak patients; relevant departments and units should make preparations for cold waves in accordance with their duties; take certain protective measures for tropical crops and aquatic products; pay attention to adding clothes to keep warm and make preparations for windbreak.
60:
Hongdong County Meteorological Observatory issued a blue warning signal for strong winds

Hongdong County Meteorological Observatory issued a blue warning signal for strong winds at 11:43 on December 27, 2024: It is expected that all towns in our county may be affected by strong winds in the next 24 hours, with an average wind force of 4-6 and gusts of 7 or above.

Defense Guide:

1. The government and relevant departments should do a good job in preventing strong winds.
2. Close doors and windows, reinforce fences, scaffolding, billboards and other structures that are easily blown by the wind, properly place outdoor items that are easily affected by strong winds, and cover construction materials.
3. Try to ride bicycles as little as possible, and do not stay under billboards, temporary structures, etc. when it is windy.
4. Relevant departments and units should pay attention to forest and grassland fire prevention.
61:
Yellow frost warning signal for Ninghua County has been issued

The Ninghua County Meteorological Observatory upgraded the blue frost warning signal to a yellow warning signal at 17:00 on December 28, 2024: It is expected that the lowest temperature in our county will reach -3~0℃ from tonight to tomorrow morning, with frost or ice. The lowest temperature in Anyuan, Helong, Zhiping and other townships and high-altitude mountainous areas will be below -4℃.

The county government and agricultural and forestry authorities should do a good job in frost prevention and emergency work in accordance with their duties; rural grassroots organizations should mobilize the masses to prevent and resist disasters; actively take anti-frost and freezing measures such as field irrigation for crops and forestry breeding to minimize losses; take measures such as covering and spraying antifreeze for vegetables, flowers, fruits and melons to reduce frost damage. Please pay attention to cold and keep warm.
